data.name: sun
data.sentence: Hou Yi shot down nine of the suns,  leaving only one sun in the sky.
data.definition: Hou Yi shot down nine of the _____s,  leaving only one _____ in the sky.

languages.tr_sentence: 后羿射下了九個太陽，只留一顆太陽在天空中。

data.name: moon
data.sentence: Chang E eats the whole pill, and she flies to the moon.

languages.tr_sentence: 嫦娥吃了整顆仙丹，飛到月亮。

data.name: hot
data.sentence: There are 10 suns in the sky, so it is very hot.
data.definition: There are 10 suns in the sky, so it is very _____.

languages.tr_sentence: 天空中有十顆太陽，所以天氣非常地熱。

data.name: happy
data.sentence: The Queen Mother of the West is very happy because Hou Yi saves people.
data.definition: The Queen Mother of the West is very _____ because Hou Yi saves people.

languages.tr_sentence: 西王母娘娘很快樂因為后羿救了人們。

languages.tr_sentence: 后羿很難過因為嫦娥飛到月亮上。

data.definition: There is a _____ archer, and his name is Hou Yi.

languages.tr_sentence: 有一位強壯的射手，他的名字叫后羿。

data.sentence: On the moon, Chang E is very lonely.

languages.tr_sentence: 在月亮上，嫦娥非常孤單。

data.sentence: When Hou Yi is not at home, a robber come in and try to rob the pill.

languages.tr_sentence: 后羿不在家時，有個搶匪闖進家裡想搶仙丹。
